KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_BizonPP19: Russian submachine gun fitted with a large capacity helical magazine.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Crossbow: Hard to use, good to assassinate.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_DP28: Soviet-made, inter-war era light machine gun.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_DesertEagle: One of the most powerful handguns in the world.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_FlareGun: Fires non-lethal flares as a supply signal.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_G18: Austrian handgun with a full-auto mode.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_G36C: Compact subcarbine variant of the German G36.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Groza: Selective fire Russian bullpup assault rifle.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_MP5K: Short variant of the German submachine gun MP5, designed for close quarters battle use.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Mk14: Selective fire designated marksmen rifle originally built for use with units of USSOC.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Mk47Mutant: Modern assault rifle capable of single and two-round burst fire modes.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_QBU88: Semi-auto Chinese bullpup designated marksman rifle.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Sawnoff: Break-open shotgun with shortened barrel capable of firing two consecutive shots.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Thompson: Infinite ammo with trench coat on.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_UZI: Spray your ammo but beware to not shoot yourself in the foot.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_VSS: Suppressed sniper rifle that uses a heavy subsonic cartridge.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_Vector: Modern submachine gun using delayed blowback system.
KeysToSourceStrings.Item_Weapon_vz61Skorpion: Czechoslovakian machine pistol with a full-auto mode.
